articles.description: According to the National Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD), the country saw very few pertussis cases reported through the notifiable medical conditions (NMC) surveillance system in the past two years.
articles.content:

articles.author: Monique Vanek
articles.title: Giant rate hike looms even as inflation slows - News24
articles.description: South African inflation decelerated for the first time since January, a slowdown that’s unlikely to sway the central bank from delivering an unprecedented second consecutive 75 basis-point hike in interest rates.
